mapper.select: SELECT asti.id, asti.saga_code, asti.task_code, asti.instance_lock, jd.data AS input, asti.actual_start_time, asti.object_version_number, asi.user_details AS user_details_json FROM asgard_saga_task_instance asti INNER JOIN ASGARD_SAGA_INSTANCE asi ON asti.saga_instance_id = asi.id LEFT JOIN asgard_orch_json_data jd ON asti.input_data_id = jd.id WHERE (asti.status = 'WAIT_TO_BE_PULLED' OR asti.status = 'RUNNING') AND asti.service = #{service} AND asti.concurrent_limit_policy = 'NONE' AND (asti.instance_lock IS null OR asti.instance_lock = #{instance}) ORDER BY asti.id
